exclusion:
Set your Z-Wave controller into unpair mode.

Triple-click the tamper switch on Door / Window Sensor 7 within 1.5 seconds.

After a successful exclusion, it will green light up its LED for 2 seconds then deactivate.
inclusion:
Set your Z-Wave controller into pairing mode.

Triple-click the tamper switch on Door / Window Sensor 7 - this begins to blink green/red.

After completion of the inclusion, Close the cover.

Note: Closing the cover is important! If the housing is not closed, the sensor is permanently awake. Only when the cover is closed does the sensor change to the idle state.
label: ZWA011
overview: Aeotec Door / Window Sensor 7 was developed to record the condition of doors or windows with Z-Wave Plus. It is powered by Aeotec’s Gen7 technology and S2 framework.
wakeup:
Wake Up the device by removing the cover.

The hit the tamper switch once, led blinks short green.

Note: Door / Window Sensor 7 Pro remains awake until the housing is closed again.

parameters.label: Door/Windows State
parameters.description: Sensor state when the magnet is close to the sensor.

parameters.label: LED
parameters.description: Defines when the LED will indicate events.
parameters.overview:
Disabling all indications may extend battery life.

0 no indications
1 indication of opening/closing status change
2 indication of wake up (1 x click or periodical)
4 indication of device tampering

Can be summed, e.g. a setting of 6 will disable open/close but enable wake-up and tamper.

options.label: indicate open and closed status change

parameters.label: Range test
parameters.overview: Z-Wave range test with double click of a Tamper Switch 2.

parameters.label: Group 2 Association Triggers
parameters.description: Events that result in sending On/Off commands to devices added to the 2nd Association Group.
parameters.overview: This parameter defines events that result in sending On/Off commands to devices added to the 2nd Association Group. These commands are sent alternately to switch the devices On and Off. Commands represent the values of BASIC SET command frames.

parameters.label: Group 2 commands
parameters.overview: Command frames sent to devices added to the 2nd association group.

parameters.label: Group 2 On
parameters.overview: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module values of 0-99 can be set.  For on/off 0 (off) or 255 (on).

parameters.label: Group 2 Off
parameters.overview: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module, values of 0-99 can be set.

parameters.label: Group 2 On Delay
parameters.description: Time delay in seconds after which On command frame will be sent.
parameters.overview: The time period after which On command frame will be sent.

parameters.label: Group 2 Off Delay
parameters.description: Time delay in seconds after which Off command frame will be sent.
parameters.overview: The time period after which Off command frame will be sent.

parameters.label: Tamper cancellation delay
parameters.description: The time period after which a tamper alarm will be canceled.
parameters.overview: The time period after which a tamper alarm will be canceled.

parameters.label: Tamper Cancel Reporting
parameters.overview: Reporting cancellation of tamper alarm to the controller and 3rd Association Group

options.label: Do not send tamper cancellation reports

parameters.label: Factory reset
parameters.overview: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.

associations.label: Magnet or Dry contact
associations.overview: Control devices when a magnet or external dry contacts (if exists) trips

associations.label: Magnet or Dry Contact Alarm
associations.description: Sends our alarm message when magnet controlled or external dry sensor trips.
associations.overview: Sends our alarm message when magnet controlled or external dry contact sensor (if exists) trips.

associations.label: Tamper
associations.overview: Sends alarm messages when tamper is tripped
